original_text: And you shall speak to the people of Israel, saying, ‘If a man dies and has no son, then you shall transfer his inheritance to his daughter.
korean_text: 너는 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르기를 사람이 죽고 아들이 없으면 그의 기업을 그의 딸에게 돌릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: And you shall speak to the people of Israel,
then you shall transfer his inheritance to his daughter.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 유산을 그의 딸에게 주어야 하느니라.
